questionDesc: Clear definition of the problem being studied
Types (e.g. books, magazines, websites, reports and other resources) and number of quality sources cited, including professionals in the field
AnswerBeginning: one type of information cited; minimal sources
AnswerDeveloping: two types of information cited; several sources
AnswerAccompished: three types of information cited; many sources, including professionals
AnswerExemplary: four(+) types of information cited; extensive sources, incl. professionals
